mortality.note: Estimates vary enormously. Bangladesh claims 3 million; independent estimates usually 300k-500k. 10 million refugees fled to India. Systematic targeting of Hindu minority and Bengali intellectuals.

rationales.systematic_intensity: Operation Searchlight targeted Bengali intellectuals, Hindus. Pakistani military systematic.
rationales.profit: Not primarily profit-driven. Political control and punishment.
rationales.ideology: Pakistani nationalism vs Bengali self-determination. Religious and ethnic dimensions.
rationales.complicity: Pakistani military, local collaborators (Razakars). US supported Pakistan. Pakistan denies.

analysis.pattern_note: South Asian genocide often overlooked in Western narratives. Operation Searchlight targeted Bengali nationalists, Hindus, and intellectuals. US and China supported Pakistan; India intervened. 'Intellectual kill list' - professors, writers systematically murdered on December 14, 1971. Pakistan still largely denies. International Crimes Tribunal held 2010-present.
analysis.root_causes: Bengali nationalism, Pakistani military dominance, ethnic and linguistic tensions
